name: Manhattan Cocktails Recipe (for a Crowd)
description: Batch up a bottle of Manhattans for your next party!
recipeIngredient: 5 ounces filtered or bottled water (something neutral, not mineral water)
Garnishes: cocktail cherries and lemon twists

recipeInstructions.text: Using a funnel, pour rye, vermouth, bitters, and water into bottle or pitcher. Close the bottle and chill well. Keep on ice or keep in fridge.
